description.value:
Wondrous Item - Very Rare

This bag resembles a Bag of Holding but is actually a feeding orifice for a gigantic extradimensional creature. Turning the bag inside out closes the orifice.


Properties

  • Animal or vegetable matter placed wholly inside is devoured and lost forever.

  • When a living creature reaches inside, there is a [[/r 1d2]]{50% chance} the creature is pulled inside. If the creature remains in the bag at the end of its turn after 1 full round, its body is consumed and destroyed.


Action - Escape Attempt (From Inside the Bag)

A trapped creature may take an action to escape.

[[/skill ath 15]]{Strength (Athletics) DC 15}


Action - Rescue Attempt (From Outside the Bag)

Another creature may take an action to pull a trapped creature out, if they are not pulled in first.

[[/skill ath 20]]{Strength (Athletics) DC 20}


Properties

  • Can hold 1 cubic foot of inanimate material. Once per day, the bag swallows these objects and spits them out into a random plane of existence (time/plane determined by the GM).

  • If pierced or torn, the bag is destroyed. Its contents are transported to a random location on the Astral Plane.

unidentified.description:
Wondrous Item - Uncommon

This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions (2 ft square, 4 ft deep). It can hold up to 500 lbs or 64 cubic feet. The bag weighs 5 lbs regardless of contents.


Action

Retrieving an item from the bag.


Properties

  • If overloaded, pierced, or torn, the bag is destroyed and its contents are scattered across the Astral Plane.

  • If turned inside out, its contents spill forth unharmed. The bag must be righted before reuse.

  • The bag contains enough air for 10 minutes of breathing, divided among the number of creatures inside.

  • Placing a Bag of Holding inside another extradimensional space (Handy Haversack, Portable Hole, etc.) instantly destroys both items and opens a gate to the Astral Plane. Any creature within 10 ft must succeed on [[/save STR 15]]{Strength Save (DC 15)} or be sucked into a random Astral Plane location. The gate then closes, one-way only.
unidentified.name: Bag of Holding
